attributes.action: apply pressure on the 2012 Olympic Games committee to scrap their chosen logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To put it simply, not one person I know actually LIKES the proposed logo for the 2012 Olympics, and knowing that the Organising Committee paid an advertising agency £400000 to design it makes it all the worse!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
